weapon.name: The Holy Sword, Aea

weapon.introduction: A legendary Holy Sword given to the world by Lua. This legendary artifact materialized 100 years ago when the Demons invaded the Orbis Continent through the Dimensional Gate. According to the legend, the Hero king Kyle used this sword to pierce the heart of the Dark Lord Angmmund and brought an end to the war. However, the two simply vanished, and only Aea remained.

treasure.name: Proxy's Insignia
description: [Proxy of God] Additionally, Dodge Rate is increased by 250, and ATK Spd is increased by 100 for the duration of skill.
[Proxy of God] Additionally, Dodge Rate is increased by 250, and ATK Spd is increased by 120 for the duration of skill.

treasure.introduction: A rune that proves that one is an agent of Lua, the Goddess of Light. The Rune of Proxy is an artifact of the Church of Lua, and it's given to the knight who wields the Aea, the Sword of Light. The Rune of Proxy pushes enemies with the power of light and increases ATK and morale.

treasure-2.name: Emperor's Gauntlet

[Valiant Dash] Increases DMG by 24% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.

treasure-2.introduction:
Gauntlet imbued with the blessing of Lua, the Goddess of Light.
Gauntlet passed down to the kings of the Orbis Continent. Containts the encouragement of the goddess that allows you to use Valiant Dash towards enemies without any fear.

weapon.name: Specter's Breath, Redeal

weapon.introduction: The group of assassins known as the Laughing Mask has been the master of Orvel's underworld for a long time. Only the best assassin of the Laughing Mask is allowed to wield this dreadful pair of daggers. It is said that the wounds inflicted by these daggers never heal, and that their victims inevitably bleed to death. According to the legend, these daggers were made from the Scythe of the Grim Reaper.

treasure.name: Cracked Mask
description: [Blade Claw] DMG is increased by 20%, and Upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 300.
[Blade Claw] DMG is increased by 24%, and Upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 300.

treasure.introduction: The mask that Roi destroyed when he left the Laughing Mask assassins. Assassins mercilessly aim for their enemy's vital points, and they wear masks to suppress their emotions when they eliminate their targets. Roi faces the split mask, and goes behind his enemies to kill them with his Blade Claws to protect his friends.

treasure-2.name: Soma's Hood

[Curtain of Darkness] Increases ATK Boost by 24% and gains CC resist by 400 for the skill's duration.

treasure-2.introduction:
A dangerous hood made with the secret method of the Laughing Mask.
It was made with the legendary soma that is said to provide endless vitality and the secret of the Laughing Mask.
Soma's hood increases the morale of an assassin inside the dark curtain, increasing their ATK, and granting dexterity, maximizing P.Dodge.

weapon.name: Primal Flame, Flenos
description: Embers explode every 4 sec, dealing 80% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies nearby.
Embers explode every 4 sec, dealing 96% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies nearby.

weapon.introduction: The essence of the First Flame of the world. The Fire Elemental Lord bestowed this beautiful gem to a human who entered into a contract with him. Over the ages, it ended up in the hands of an archmage, who turned it into the core of his staff. later, the archmage presented this staff to his precious disciple.

treasure.name: Tome of Purgatory
description: [Fire Rain] DMG is increased by 20%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Ember, skill cooldown is reduced by 3%.
[Fire Rain] DMG is increased by 24%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Ember, skill cooldown is reduced by 3%.

[Fire Rain] DMG is increased by 50%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Ember, skill cooldown is reduced by 3%.
treasure.introduction: A scroll written by a fire sorceress who was known as the Goddess of Fire. A scroll left by the greatest fire Sorceress of Orvelia, Vesta, when she was in the Tower of Sage. It's very powerful, but it also requires a lot of mana. Cleo took the scroll of Burning hell from the Tower of sage, which was considered a forbidden scroll. Now she's using it to enhance her Fire Rain.

treasure-2.name: Flamel's Elixir
description: [Fire Ball] Increases DMG by 20% and leaves 5 stacks of Ember on the affected enemy.
[Fire Ball] Increases DMG by 24% and leaves 5 stacks of Ember on the affected enemy.
[Fire Ball] Increases DMG by 29% and leaves 5 stacks of Ember on the affected enemy.

treasure-2.introduction:
An elixir that fire alchemist Flamel created by condensing flame essence.
Flamel's flames continue to burn and burn.
Every wizard praises him for his flames, and the flame essence that he made with the salamanders from the Dragia Volcano maximizes the effect of Fire Ball.

weapon.name: God's Authority, Rosmerta
description: Each auto attack has a 40% chance of healing the ally with the lowest HP by 42% of ATK

weapon.introduction: The Angels are said to be closer to Lua than any other race. When a high ranking angel dies, the remaining core is transferred to the haven of angels for resurrection. However, one such angel, Rosmerta, bestowed her core to the Church of Lua. This holy staff has been created from the core's divine energy.

treasure.name: Forgotten Arbiter's Feather
description: [Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 1 sec.
[Heaven's Vengeance] Target takes 20% increased M.DMG for 10 sec, and Blind duration is increased by 1.5 sec.

treasure.introduction: Feather from the Guardian of the Sun. Feather of an angel who saved the people by fighting against the demons in the past. He left his feather as proof of his promise to return once again if the world falls into chaos. An artifact of the Church of Lua that summons holy rays of the sun to blind the enemy.

treasure-2.name: Miraculous Medal
description: [Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 100 Mana every second for 4 sec.
[Blessings of Light] Increases shield amount by 50% and recovers 120 Mana every second for 4 sec.

treasure-2.introduction:
Medal made by the saintess of miracles, Yvonne, with the revelation of the goddess.
The Medal of Miracles is a sacred artifact that containts the magic of light. It is said that saintess Yvonne saved the city that was invaded by the demons with the blessing of light that was boosted with this medal.

weapon.name: Noble Fate, Mahitra
description: Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 40% of ATK as extra M.DMG.
Each attack has a 35% chance of dealing 48% of ATK as extra M.DMG.

weapon.introduction: In the Tower of Sage, the title of Purple indicates the pinnacle of mana capacity. Aisha's seemingly endless mana was simply too much for regulars means of output. For this reason, the Von Daphnel family bought out of all the best mana stones they could find, and took them to Annette, the best technomagi in Orvel Castle. Annette gladly agreed to take on this new project. Soon after, she created Mahitra, a beautiful umbrella befitting an aristocratic wizard of noble destiny.

treasure.name: Ring of Infinite Mana
description: [Torrential Rainfall] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, recovers 30 mana.
[Torrential Rainfall] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, recovers 36 mana.
[Torrential Rainfall] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit, recovers 43 mana.

treasure.introduction: A ring that was given along with the title of Purple from the Tower of Sage. It is an artifact of witch Eucaletus, who lived in the Swamp of Wisdom. The power it displays depends on the owner's ability. For some, it could be a source of unlimited mana. It's perfect for Aisha, who uses powerful magic cannons.

treasure-2.name: Noble Hand Mirror
description: [Destruction Ray] Increases DMG by 50% and recovers 500 MP immediately upon use.
[Destruction Ray] Increases DMG by 50% and recovers 600 MP immediately upon use.

treasure-2.introduction: A sacred treasure passed down through generations of the von Daphnel family. It was a shaman tool to save mana in ancient times. After Aisha embedded the Noble Purple gem with her mana, its power came out. Now it shines brilliantly.

weapon.name: Crystallized Technomagic, Rascal
description: Every 1.5 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.
Every 1.4 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.
Every 1.3 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.

Every 0.7 sec, gains 1 stack of Charge and recovers 1% mana.
weapon.introduction: The essence of technomagi, created based on Annette's theory. Five of the highest-ranking court of wizards of Orvel have poured their energy into creating this magical being. It has its own will, making it capable of making independent decisions and acting on them. While it shares its mana with Annette, it can also utilize any other available mana nearby. As such, it is the first great milestone in Annette's effort to make magic available to all.

treasure.name: Code of Annihilation
description: [Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 20% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 24% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 29% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 35% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 42% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
[Process of Elimination] DMG is increased by 50% and upon ATK, gains 2 stack of Charge. This stack can be gained while in Overcharge state.
treasure.introduction: The top secret code of Babel, the secret society of magic engineering. Magic for normal people! The secret society of technomagi, Babel, is an anonymous society that dreams of making magic available to all. They have each provided a technomagical technique as a secret code, and they've only allowed the use of it to those who can decipher it. Annette deciphered a top secret code in 4 minutes and is using it in the annihilation process.

treasure-2.name: Script of Healing
description: [Emergency Treatment] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases Heal Rate by 20%.
[Emergency Treatment] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases Heal Rate by 24%.

[Emergency Treatment] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases Heal Rate by 50%.
treasure-2.introduction:
A healing script for emergencies.
It's a product of the secret society of magic engineering, Babel's workshop for the month, 'Battles are Self-serve! Winning scripts in Mechanic Script Battles.'
Created by Annette, it's a skill that can heal allies just through engineering, without borrowing any healing magic powers.

weapon.name: Clear Blue Sky, Sherrkyle
description: Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 168% of ATK as M.DMG.
Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 201.6% of ATK as M.DMG.
Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 241.5% of ATK as M.DMG.

Every 10 sec, inflicts a Judgement Sigil upon a random enemy for 15 sec and deals 420% of ATK as M.DMG.
weapon.introduction: A powerful weapon of light that can take the form of a spear, a dagger, or a bow. One of the divine treasures of the Angels blessed by an archangel. It is said to be capable of incinerating evil. Due to its versatility, it has traditionally been given to the most talented scout. The number of Demons who perished under its light during the war is too high to count.

treasure.name: Eye of Heaven
description: [Arbiter] DMG is increased by 20% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.
[Arbiter] DMG is increased by 24% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.
[Arbiter] DMG is increased by 29% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.

[Arbiter] DMG is increased by 50% and all allies' ATK is increased by 30% for the duration of M.Shield.
treasure.introduction: Angel Arbiter Pilier's soul egg. Pilier was born from Lua's first flame, and is Arch's master. Pilier was the best Angel warrior and was the one to end the war against the Demons. But after using all of his power, he went back to being an Eye of Heaven, which is the soul egg from, and Arch is holding onto his master's soul.

treasure-2.name: Magic Square of Pursuit
description: [Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 20%.
[Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 24%.

[Purifying Blaze] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases DMG by 50%.
treasure-2.introduction:
Symbol of the Fire Arbiter Army.
Symbol of the Fire Arbiter Army that did great things during the war against the Demons. When using the Magic Square of Pursuit that the Light of Goddess Lua has permitted, Arch becomes a merciless arbiter.

weapon.name: Brilliant Praise, Brauxio
description: Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 200% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 20%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 240% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 24%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.

Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 500% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 50%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
weapon.introduction: This sacred treasure of Penteonia is said to have been sent from the Heavens to eradicate the Demons. This light staff, known to respond only to those worthy of sainthood, radiated with splendid light in the hands of the young Artemia, as if to honor the future empress. It calls upon the power of absolute light, unleashing heaven's vengeance upon its enemies while protecting its wielder with divine light.

treasure.name: Crown of Brilliance
description: [Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 20% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 24% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 29% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 35% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 42% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
[Light's Judgment] DMG is increased by 50% and upon killing an enemy, recovers 700 mana.
treasure.introduction: A crown that is passed down to the king of Penteonia. A part of it had been broken by a previous tyrant, but it's been repaired. A new red gem called the Soul of the Sun has been embedded at the center of the crown. Its dignified form compels one to kneel before it in a show of respect.

treasure-2.name: Queen's Pride
description: [Critical Intensity] Gains Immunity to CC and increases DMG by 20%.
[Critical Intensity] Gains Immunity to CC and increases DMG by 24%.

[Critical Intensity] Gains Immunity to CC and increases DMG by 42%.
[Critical Intensity] Gains Immunity to CC and increases DMG by 50%.
treasure-2.introduction:
Earrings made from light kveril, a rare mineral that is said to only come out in Penteonia. When Artemia was crowned Empress, she received it along with the crown. It doesn't lose its light even at night, and it actually shines even more brightly in the dark. It's known as the jewel of principles and brilliance amongst the people.
An item that raises the dignity of the queen as they shine from her ears.

weapon.name: Solar Halo, Ignisius
description: When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 20% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 24% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 29% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.

When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 42% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
When a normal attack hits the enemy 5 times, the target takes 50% more M.DMG for 10 seconds and is stunned for 0.5 seconds.
weapon.introduction: Legends speak of a mysterious metal, gold as the glorious rays of the sun, blue as the pure sky, and white as the blinding light. This holy sword and shield set has been forged from that special metal that only Angels can handle. These are divine relics of protection, created to banish the darkness and fill the world with light. Bestowed only to the most righteous Guardian Knight of the Angels, these relics can instantly incinerate any Demon that faces their light.

treasure.name: Guardian's Trumpet
description: [Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost and M.DEF Reduction by 20%.
[Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost and M.DEF Reduction by 24%.

[Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost and M.DEF Reduction by 50%.
treasure.introduction: The trumpet that is said to be blown by the leader of the Archangels when the catastrophe that will end the Material World arrives. It is said that once the guardians hear the sound of the trumpet, they wake up and come down to protect this land.

treasure-2.name: Bracelet of the Sun
description: [Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases P.Weakness of the target by 10% for 10 sec.
[Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases P.Weakness of the target by 12% for 10 sec.
[Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases P.Weakness of the target by 14% for 10 sec.

[Blessing of the Sun] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and increases P.Weakness of the target by 25% for 10 sec.
treasure-2.introduction:
Bracelet made by the Archangels to protect the Angels when they descend down to the earth. It contains the sun, so its shines brilliantly.
When the angels feel fear, it is said that the sunlight from the bracelet protects their souls. And the fates of the angels are intertwined in the bracelet, so when they feel like their lives are threatened, they can feel each other's pain instinctively.

weapon.name: God's Book, Genesis
description: Every 30 sec, for 10 sec, a random ally's ATK is increased by 40%, and Crit Chance, ATK Spd is increased by 400.
Every 30 sec, for 10 sec, a random ally's ATK is increased by 48%, and Crit Chance, ATK Spd is increased by 480.
Every 30 sec, for 10 sec, a random ally's ATK is increased by 57%, and Crit Chance, ATK Spd is increased by 570.

Every 30 sec, for 10 sec, a random ally's ATK is increased by 100%, and Crit Chance, ATK Spd is increased by 1000.
weapon.introduction: Even among the holy relics bestowed to the high priests of the Church of Lua, the God's Book Genesis is special. According to the legend, this book, guarded throughout the ages by the Grand Priests of the church, was written by Lua herself, Iris, the current Grand Priest, upon receiving revelation regarding Baudouin, entrusted this book to his step father, Berman. Later, the book was given to Baudouin when he became a high priest. It is said that this divine relic provides infinite holy energy to its owner, along with the power to unlock the true potential of those who have faith.

treasure.name: Well-Worn Rosary
description: [Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 120 Mana per sec.
[Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 140 Mana per sec.
[Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 170 Mana per sec.

[Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 250 Mana per sec.
[Holy Sanctuary] ATK is increased by 25% for the duration of skill, and recovers 300 Mana per sec.
treasure.introduction: The rosary that holy priest Evelyn of the Church of Lua carried until her death. It's as if Lua's holy voice can be heard from the rosary, praying that the world won't collapse. The undeniable holy energy engulfs the body, and it maximizes Baudouin's power.

treasure-2.name: Last Chapter of the Bible
description: [Spear of Light] Gains Immunity to CC for the skill's duration and increases M.Weakness of the target by 10% for 10 sec.

treasure-2.introduction: The last chapter of the legend that was too horrifying and terrifying to put in the Bible. It talks about the holy light that kills the darkest enemy in the world.

weapon.introduction: Cassandra works double as an arms dealer. One day, a stolen item came into her possession which immediately caught her attention. It was a beautiful fan adorned with gold decorations and precious gems. According to the rumors, every single lady who possessed this fan soon fell into great misfortune. It has been circulating the market as a cursed item. As soon as she bought it, Cassandra began investigating its origin. As it turned out, this fan, named Goldbreeze, had been created to serve as a concealed weapon. It shouldn't be too hard to guess as to what kind of misfortune the unaware owners of this fan might have suffered.

A luxurious accessory made by the greatest jeweler in the continent.
A limited edition ornament created by jeweler Larik. Any person in high society on the Orbis Continent would love to have one.
His work is said to be the epitome of art, and it is said to heal and grant courage.
There are only 3 of the limited edition Fancy Ornaments, and one of them obviously belongs to the master of the Gold Bar.

weapon.introduction: A sword and shield set engraved with various Runes and infused with ancient magic. These legendary items are said to have been created eons ago by an ancient dragon named Exian, using its own scales. As one of the royal treasures of Orvel, the sword is bestowed only to the knight of the most honorable principles. Its wielder shall serve as the defender of the kingdom and its people, and the protector of life.

treasure.name: Guardian Knight Insignia

A Gold lion Rune that is given to knights when they first join the Guardian knights, along with the vow that they will give their lives to protect the kingdom. The rune from the Guardian Knights bolsters a knight's iron will and loyalty, increasing the effectiveness of the Guardian Shield.

treasure-2.introduction:
Old wooden shield of the knight of the Iron Wall.
It's a precious shield that Clause used when he first started training. He has since engraved the name of his deceased comrades in order to remember his determination as a guardian knight.
Each time he pushes away enemies with the shield, the knight's firm determination helps him tap into power beyong his limits.

weapon.name: The Blue Light, Arpheus

weapon.introduction: One day, a vein exuding powerful mana was discovered in the territory of Ziltrion. While investigating, Demia found a blue ore, the likes of which she had never seen before. Numerous wizards and alchemists studied this mysterious ore with the characteristics of both gem and metal, but no one could figure out its identity. Jin, the blacksmith, however, had a different idea. As soon as he saw the ore, he offered Demia to craft powerful gears out of it, with a big smile on his face. With it, he forged a lance and a shield, glowing blue with mana and tougher than a diamond.

treasure.name: Aura of Protection

treasure.introduction: A stone known to protect one's soul from being absorbed by evil. It only shines for a while at dawn, so it's hard to find. One day, when Demia was fired from battle, a comrade put this in her hands. Even though its a comrade that she can't ever see again...Demia always takes this stone when going out to the battlefield. She does her best to uphold her to to never let the sacrifices of her comrades be in vain.

treasure-2.name: Shield of Resolution

treasure-2.introduction:
A wooden shield that Demia used as a child for practice. It's been used over a thousand times and is very worn out.
Demia uses it to regain her composure when she feels like she has hit a limit.
Her pride as a knight of Orvelia resurfaces when she sees this old, worn-out shield.

weapon.introduction: A treasure of the Dark Elves created using a powerful moonlight stone from Arrovina and a moon tree branch of the highest quality. Nerius is a perfect medium for Moonlight magic, and it is one of the most powerful magic weapons if the Dark Elves. However, it is said that the beautiful silver light of the moon can easily be tainted by darkness. A sublime love has turned into deep darkness, and the dark elf longing for vengeance has fused that darkness into this weapon.

treasure.introduction: Tear fragments of the beast Heltanios, who lived at the bottom of the Fountain of Life. It spews out pitch darkness, and those who see its eyes end up having their souls stolen by the powerful dark energy. Those who become the master of these eyes will obtain great power and insight. When Dimael was captured in Aegina and was at the brink of death, Maria embedded these eye fragments.

treasure-2.introduction: A bracelet that was shared with Epigael a long time ago. It has shadow morion hanging, which is a precious jewel amongst the Dark Elves. It is said that those who cut off the shadow morion and will have a thread of their souls, which will lead them to meet again in the next life.

weapon.introduction: A deadly scythe that matches the characters of its wielder, Epis. It reaps the souls of those who approach it to admire its beauty. Created from within Epis's own body, the weapon is much like a succubus itself. It delivers extreme pleasure to its victims before absorbing their life energy. It seems that, in a way, Epis tried to show some sort of kindness with this weapon.

The dancing of a girl wearing red heels caught her eye, and she made a deal with her in exchange for those shoes. Epis wears her seductive heels and gets carried away when inflicting pain on her enemies with her dance.

Box containing the Nightmare Queen's sand of sleep.
A box from the Demon World that contains magic sand that causes one to fall asleep. When the enemy falls asleep, attacks the enemy and deals M.DMG through a nightmare that cannot be dispelled.

weapon.introduction: A set of enchanted weapons bestowed upon Fluss's grandfather, a knight hailing from the Republic of Grey, and passed down as family treasures. They are capable of gradually enhancing the physical abilities of their wielder, allowing him to break the boundaries of human limitations and gain supernatural power and speed. Because the effect is gradual, there is no sudden stress to the wielder's body. Each piece is called Blood and Rose, respectively. The names originated from the swirl of blood splatter and flower petals that follow whenever Fluss swings these twin swords. No other warrior has been able to utilize their potential as Fluss does.

treasure.introduction: A rose that will never wither, even if it's been picked. It's a flower that Fluss loves. It reminds Fluss about the duty of a knight, which is the basis for his strong will that allows him to be confident in battle.

treasure-2.introduction: Perfume containing the first Vivienne roses of the year. Vivienne roses are beautifull but deadly. Those affected by the smell will hallucinate and just stare in awe as their opponent moves.

weapon.introduction: It i said that there lies a sacred beast protecting the barbarians in the Windland Snow Mountain. This beast, capable of dispelling the power of darkness, is supposed to be a blue phoenix composed of ice. Created in the shape of this beast is Numinu, its name means 'holy'. It has been crafted from enchanted ice that never melts. Considered a holy relic among Barbarians, this weapon is bestowed to their mightiest warrior. The wielder of this weapon is the most powerful warrior among Barbarians, and may be considered their king.

treasure.introduction: Mug of the Barbarian King who first settled down in the snowy mountains. When the first Barbarian King settled down in Windland, he swore to become the guardian of the snowy mountains and shared this mug with the holy beings of the mountains. To protect magic of the frost wolf imbued in the Barbarian mug increases the ATK of Vortex and the effect of freeze.

treasure-2.introduction:
Trumpet made with the horn of the guardian beast of the Windland Snow Mountain, Orox. Orox of the Snowy Mountain grants noble warriors great power and thr ability to see the truth.
When a warrior who has received the blessing of Orox blows this horn, it will boost the morale of comrades and bring clarity to their minds.

weapon.introduction: A pair of gauntlets custom forged for Gladi. They are proof of his winning the championship at the Orvel Arena. Supposedly, these were crafted from a legendary pair of gauntlets used by a man who was known as the War God hundreds of years ago. These gauntlets, specialized for smashing the opponent, greatly enhance the power of their wearer. However, the physical cost of using them is brutal, and no normal person can handle them. Unless the wearer is incredibly flexible, and physically capable of withstanding the impact of each blow, using them is almost suicidal. Nevertheless, Gladi's natural strength and flexibility allow him to use them freely.

treasure.name: Champion's Laurel Wreath

treasure.introduction: Wreath given to the strongest warrior of Orbis Continent. It's only given to the winner of the fighting tournament that happens every 4 years. Those who wear this wreath are said to be able to borrow the strength of the War God.

Silvervine is used to exponentially boost physical ability.
Nothing else, but this silvervine. Others may try chewing silvervine, drink it, boil it, but it won't work.
Gladi just needs this silvervine to have the effect of the War God.

weapon.introduction: When Malduk's magic resurrected Jane as an undead, she should not have felt anything. Yet, she felt warm and comfortable as mysterious energy surrounded her dead body. She should not have been able to even feel it. But when Malduk took her, she instinctively reached out to the warm presence. Later, when a mysterious magic brought her back to consciousness, the first thing she did was to inspect her coffin, which radiated with tragic yet warm love. Inside, she found the following message carefully engraved: 'My unchanging love for you'.

treasure.name: Flowers of a Forgotten Dukedom

treasure.introduction: A flower of the Republic of Grey that can no longer be found. It is also known as the Flower of Boundaries that connects life and death, and it gets its nourishment from destruction. A painfully beautiful flower. If you gift it to someone, you will be able to share that person's last moment in a dream.

[Mark of Death] Increases ATK by 5% and Crit DMG by 25% for 20 sec when the marked enemy dies. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
treasure-2.introduction:
The cushion that Jane hugs to sleep inside the coffin. It's imbued with the spirits that fell asleep with her inside the coffin.
They contantly give the hollowness of death to Jane.

weapon.name: The Bluewind, Coventina
description: Enemies inflicted by Electrify receive 50 % of ATK as M.DMG every 5 sec, and have a 10% chance of being Stunned.
Enemies inflicted by Electrify receive 50 % of ATK as M.DMG every 5 sec, and have a 12% chance of being Stunned.

Enemies inflicted by Electrify receive 50 % of ATK as M.DMG every 5 sec, and have a 25% chance of being Stunned.
weapon.introduction: A staff resembling the four-winged thunderbird. Indeed, it has been crafted from a feather of a thunderbird, a beast considered holy among the Skywind Orcs. The staff has the power to communicate with the sky, read the weather, and control the air. To a Skywind shaman who uses the power of lighting, this staff i the ultimate medium.

treasure.name: Skywind Feather Decoration
description: [Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 20% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 24% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 29% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 35% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 42% boost effect is added.
[Swift Wind] Mana cost is reduced by 1, and Crit DMG 50% boost effect is added.
treasure.introduction: Feather from a thunderbird, guardian of rain and thunder. The high ranking shamans of the Skywind Tribe commune through the feathers of a thunderbird. Shamans use this feather accessory when using Swift Wind to become one with the thunderbird., increasing ATK and ATK speed of all allies.

treasure-2.name: Thunderbird Mask
description: [Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 200% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
[Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 240% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
[Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 290% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.

[Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 500% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
treasure-2.introduction:
Mask of the auspicious thunderbird that brings rain.
Once the Healing Droplets of the Skywind shaman begin, the soul of the thunderbird stays by those who were hit by Healing Rain and recovers their tired bodies.

weapon.name: Flowing Circle, Eltoirre
description: Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 80% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 96% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 115% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 138% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 166% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 200% of DMG dealt to target.
weapon.introduction: An ankh crafted in the shape of a phoenix. It symbolizes the natural cycle of life. In the ancient days, the nomads of the desert worshipped the blue dragon of the oasis as their protector. In return, she blessed them with rain and gave life to their crops. To show their gratitude, the nomads offered her various treasures, including Lazulia, the gem of water. Although she had no particular interest in material wealth, she accepted their gratitude, and used the treasures to build a temple within the oasis. This ankh is the sacred symbol of the temple, and contains the mighty power of water.

treasure.name: Papyrus of the Flow
description: [Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 500 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 600 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 720 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 860 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 1040 mana.
[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 1250 mana.
treasure.introduction: A sample of the ancient scripture, the Book of Chaos, that was swept away. The Book of Chaos is a historic scripture that is passed down to the Priest of Water, and it has records of culture, magic, and various fields. It was sealed in the Golden Shrine along with Laias, but most of the book disappeared while she was sleep. The remaining Papyrus of Flows is a boosting spell of the Festival of the Flow.

treasure-2.name: Oasis Crystal
description: [Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 12% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.
[Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 14% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.
[Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 17% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.

[Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.
treasure-2.introduction: Water essence that the Blue Dragons protect. The essence of an oasist that the Blue Dragons brought to the desert at the beginning of the world. Protecting and defending this is the sacred mission of the Priestess of Water Laias, and it is her favorite thing to do. The Oasis Crystal leads the Priestess of Water who uses the Bubble Shield to the person who most needs her help.

weapon.name: Lakrak MK-1
description: Each auto attack has a 25% chance of increasing ATK Spd by 300 for 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 25% chance of increasing ATK Spd by 360 for 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 25% chance of increasing ATK Spd by 420 for 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 25% chance of increasing ATK Spd by 510 for 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 25% chance of increasing ATK Spd by 615 for 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 25% chance of increasing ATK Spd by 750 for 10 sec.
weapon.introduction: The destructive yet artistic magnum opus of a quirky Goblin inventor. This single-hand cannon packs the maximum amount of firepower a single Goblin can physically handle. Despite the dangerous amount of gunpowder used, this weapon has fortunately not blown up yet.

treasure.name: Goblincraft Special High-Density Gunpowder
description: [Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 200 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 240 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 290 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 350 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 420 mana.
[Glue Bomb] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 500 mana.
treasure.introduction: Gunpowder made with Lakrak's dangerous secret recipe. Lakrak believed that simple explosions weren't effective enough in terms of battle strategy, so he added some formic acid and stinging nettle poison to add a stunning effect. It requires an extremely accurate filtering process, and he uses it in secret to avoid abuse.

treasure-2.name: Special Gas Mask
description: [Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 1 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 1.2 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 1.4 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 1.7 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 2.1 sec.
[Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases blind duration by 2.5 sec.
treasure-2.introduction:
A high-performing mask that was made with special materials that Lakrak obtained from around the Orbis Continent.
This mask is made from Harpy's first feather, a dragon's scales, a leaf from the World Tree, and the empire's mithril, which are all hard to find. This mask protects one from poisonous gas as well as the blinding effect of Smoke Bombs.

weapon.name: Phoenix Quill, Belisa
description: Each auto attack has a 10% chance of dealing 100% extra M.DMG, and dispelling all positive effects
Each auto attack has a 12% chance of dealing 100% extra M.DMG, and dispelling all positive effects

weapon.introduction: The phoenix is a holy beast that symbolizes eternal life. As elusive as the beast itself is, its feather is considered extremely rare as well. It is said that a quill crafted from a phoenix feather is a powerful magical tool in its own right. Runes drawn with this quill can serve as a powerful medium for Rune magic.

treasure.name: Scroll of Memories
description: [Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 120.
[Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 140.
[Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 170.

[Rune of Silence] Target takes 15% increased DMG for 10 sec, and target's CC resistance is reduced by 300.
treasure.introduction: Ancient sorcery codex. A codex written by respected sorcerers that contains the principle behind magic that uses all of life and creation. It's written in an unknown language, so only part of it can be decoded. If the ancient text system is discovered, it might be possible to use spells without any cost whatsoever.

treasure-2.name: Ink of Vitality
description: [Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 100 for 10 sec.
[Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 120 for 10 sec.
[Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 140 for 10 sec.

[Rune of Healing] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and P.Crit Resistance of allies by 250 for 10 sec.
treasure-2.introduction:
Ink made by extracting young leaves from the World Tree. Only 10 droplets can be produced in a year.
The magic spells written with this ink grant great vitality to the body.
It's very precious and hard to obtain, so Leo doesn't use it unless it's for a special occasion.

weapon.name: Scarlet Ruler, Dominicia
description: If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 20%. If HP is under 50%, takes 10% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 24%. If HP is under 50%, takes 12% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 29%. If HP is under 50%, takes 14% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 35%. If HP is under 50%, takes 17% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 42%. If HP is under 50%, takes 21% reduced DMG.
If HP is over 50%, ATK is increased by 50%. If HP is under 50%, takes 25% reduced DMG.
weapon.introduction: A staff of blood that has been passed down in the family of the Vampire Lord through the generations. Its crimson color symbolizes the authority, insight, and the absolute power of the Vampire Lord. Deep in the underground of the Galia Plains is the holy land of the Vampires. This legendary staff lies there, ready to appear at the call of the master worthy of it, wherever that may be.

treasure.name: Blood of the Ancients
description: [Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 20%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 24%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 29%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 35%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 42%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 50%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
treasure.introduction: Ancient vampire queen's blood. The more pure-blooded a vampire is, the stronger their mana blood. The greatest of them all is the ancient vampire queen's blood, and the vampires who drink her blood will have unlimited life and mana. It is a highly addictive type of blood, so be careful when using it.

treasure-2.name: Spell of Bloody Mist
description: [Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 20% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 24% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 29% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 35% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 42% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
[Blood Zone] Increases DMG by 50% and the effect duration by 2 sec.
treasure-2.introduction:
Magic tool of the successor of blood.
The spells of the pure Vampire Lord's family have been passed down through generations. The successor of Lewisia is Vampire Sir Lusben, and the Spell of Bloody Mist is a gift from him. Lewisia hates anything that has to do with being a successor, but she likes how the Blood Zone reduces her fatigue, so she enjoys using it.

weapon.name: World Tree's Will, Roburu
description: Every 7 sec, deals 40% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 10%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 48% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 12%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.

Every 7 sec, deals 83% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 20%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
Every 7 sec, deals 100% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Poison, and reduces enemy M.DEF by 25%. Per every stacked Poison, DMG is increased by 20%.
weapon.introduction: The legend has it that, once every 100 years, the World Tree bestows one of its branches to a chosen once. The branch radiates with eternal life, gaining immense power and knowledge to its owner. Fusing the branch with the stone of the Forest, an Elven Treasure, Lorraine created this staff. Now, she can call upon the forces of nature and remain connected to the World Tree wherever she goes.

treasure.name: Root of the World Tree
description: [Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 20%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 24%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 29%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 35%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 42%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
[Wrath of the Forest] DMG is increased by 50%. Upon Crit Hit on enemies with over 5 stacks of Poison, skill cooldown is reduced by 4%.
treasure.introduction: Proof of the unity between the Druids and the World Tree. The great sages of Elidora have always maintained a deep bond with the World Tree. The roots of the World Tree are proof of its deep bond with the Druids. They attack enemies with supernatural DMG whenever Druids shout the Wrath of the Forest to show nature's fury and hostility.

treasure-2.name: Deadly Belladonna
description: [Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 200 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 240 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 290 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 350 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 420 MP from the affected enemy.
[Tangled Vine] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and drains 500 MP from the affected enemy.
treasure-2.introduction:
The beautiful but poisonous Belladonna.
It's a dangerous plant that only the Great Sage can handle. The little Belladonna that is mixed up with vines poisons enemies and makes them defenseless against magic attacks.

weapon.name: Flower of Eternity, Hyacinth
description: Increases DMG of normal attacks by 20% and the Range by 6%.
Increases DMG of normal attacks by 24% and the Range by 7.2%.
Increases DMG of normal attacks by 29% and the Range by 8.6%.
Increases DMG of normal attacks by 35% and the Range by 10.5%.
Increases DMG of normal attacks by 42% and the Range by 12.5%.
Increases DMG of normal attacks by 50% and the Range by 15%.
weapon.introduction: A slingshot made from hyacinth, a silver tree that only grows in extremely cold regions. It is said that hyacinths have been blessed by the Queen of ice, and are able to bear bright red fruits even in the coldest weather. Simply holding onto a hyacinth branch allows one to ignore coldness around the holder. These blessed trees also have the power to call upon snowstorms and frost. Needless to say, these powers are best harnessed by the weapon carved from one of these trees.

treasure.name: Never-Melting Snow Flower
description: [Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 20% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 24% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 29% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 35% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 42% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
[Twinkle Twinkle] DMG is increased by 50% and target inflicted with Crit Chance reduction cannot dispel the effect.
treasure.introduction: A legendary snowfield flower that blossomed from the never melting Land of Windland Snow Mountain. It is said that it makes the energy of it's master's body from clearly and beautifully. An item that makes Luna's pure energy shine even brighter.

treasure-2.name: Moonlight Carrot
description: [Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 20% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
[Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 24% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
[Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 29% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.

[Look Out Above!] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces Cooldown by 10% upon a Crit Hit.
treasure-2.introduction:
A carrot that grew from receiving moonlight a thousand times.
Those hit by this carrot will have all evil stripped away from them, and they'll be able to tell apart good from bad.

weapon.name: Lea's Messenger, Cocytus
description: Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 300% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 375% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 450% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 525% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 625% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
Upon a critical hit, deal continuous M. DMG equal to 750% of ATK to the enemy for 10 sec and reduce their recovery rate by 50%.
weapon.introduction: A mysterious raven that can travel across dimensions. Its intelligence and shrewdness are certainly not those of a mere bird. In truth, it is a monster filled with dark energy, much like Demons. Indeed, it is said that this beast is as powerful as a high-ranking demon. Some claim that it occasionally flies over fields of battle, speaking in human languages. Much of this creature's identity is till shrouded in mystery.

treasure.name: Pendant of Darkness
description: [Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 20%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 24%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 29%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 35%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 42%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
[Area of Darkness] DMG is increased by 50%, and the last attack reduces target's P.DEF and M.DEF by 30% for 7 sec.
treasure.introduction: Ashes of a grey messenger that announces the end. These are the ashes of a raven that flew into the Church of Lua right before the Republic of Grey collapsed a hundred years ago. Everyone ignored the ominous messenger, and only Priestess Maria cared for it until its last day. Even after its death, it has helped Maria expand her area of darkness by pouring its dark energy on her.

treasure-2.name: Spirit's Sabaton
description: [Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 10% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 12% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 14% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 17% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 21% for 10 sec.
[Claw of Restriction] Increases DMG by 50% and increases M.Weakness of the affected enemy by 25% for 10 sec.
treasure-2.introduction:
A claw armor that Maria gifted to Lea's messenger.
The claw armor that is made with fancy gold contains a binding curse that never lets go of any enemy that it grabs. Enemies bound by the messenger's Sabaton will become defenseless against magic attacks and will receive great damage.

weapon.name: The Box of Fragrance, Etelia
description: Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 10%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 12%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 14%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 17%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 20%.
Upon activating 'Take this!', applies the effects of 'Take anything!' to all allies and reduces cooldown of all own skills by 25%.
weapon.introduction: A curious basket always carried by May whenever she goes hunting for new materials. This mysterious basket contains an infinite amount of space, and turns anything that enters it weightless. This allows May to bring back a ridiculous number of items from a single trip. At quick glance, it might as well be filled with picnic foods. However, rumors claim that, whenever she takes it to her hunting trips, she packs it with ... ... Other questionable things. Or so they say.

treasure.name: Crystal Ball from Unknown Origin
description: [Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 20% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 24% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 29% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 35% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 42% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
[Not for sale!] DMG is increased by 50% and attacks the enemy 1 more time.
treasure.introduction: During the days of the ancient civilization, someone stole the spells of the sages and gathered their power in a single crystal ball. It seems like it was part of a plan to become the greatest shaman at the time. But there are no historic records of this crystal ball, and it was found away from the village, near Eden River. Different elemental spells are mixed up in one place, making it dangerous, so it's unknown how its powers will be released.

treasure-2.name: Sweet Piece of Cake
description: [Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 20% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.
[Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 24% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.
[Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 29% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.

[Cheer Up!] Increases Heal Rate by 50% and the chance of double Heal Rate by 20% additionally.
treasure-2.introduction:
Special cake made by Juno. Its smells very sweet.

May loves it as a snack. No one knows why she doesn't tell anyone what she put in it.

weapon.name: Merciful Threat, Phistonia
description: Special Poison DMG is increased by 40% and targets inflicted by Poison take 30% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 48% and targets inflicted by Poison take 36% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 57% and targets inflicted by Poison take 43% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 69% and targets inflicted by Poison take 52% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 83% and targets inflicted by Poison take 62% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.

Special Poison DMG is increased by 100% and targets inflicted by Poison take 75% of Mediana's ATK as extra P.DMG when hit by allies other than Mediana. Additional P.DMG effect activates only once per 1 sec.
weapon.introduction: The story goes back to when Mediana's poison experiments were still being kept secret from her peers. One day, a fellow doctor noticed the giant syringe she had made. Impressed by its sheer size, he asked her: 'Look at the size of that thing. Should't you at least give it a name?' To this, Mediana replied, nonchalantly: 'Oh...just call it... Piston.'

treasure.name: Mysterious Potion
description: [Strengthening Potion] dispels target's negative effects and target gains immunity to CC for 2 sec.

treasure.introduction: A special potion that has the teachings of a master. The genius surgeon and expert on anatomy. Doctor Aldini, is Mediana's master. Doctor Aldini recognized her talent early on, and he taught her extraordinary medical knowledge that couldn't have been imagined in the Church of Lua. The unidentifiable potion that was made with her master's special recipe increases the effect of the Strengthening Potion.

treasure-2.name: Special Potion of Double Reaction
description: [Special Water Cannon] Increases Resistance by 30% and reduces Cooldown by 12%.

[Special Water Cannon] Increases Resistance by 30% and reduces Cooldown by 30%.
treasure-2.introduction:
A special potion that has two type of effects. Mediana wondered if there was a way to handle attack and recovery at once. She went to the library and read a dusty book called 'Slimes Can Also Make Cannons.'
Mediana was reading just for fun, but found a way to apply the principle of cannons into her piston. She was then able to invent the Special Potion of Double Reaction and maximize recovery and attack when using Special Water Cannon. Mediana is still thankful to the author of the book who gave her the inspiration.

weapon.name: Endless Acceleration, Riventina
description: Increases ATK Spd by 200, and attacks on Locked On enemies, dealing 200% of ATK as extra M.DMG. Extra damage effect occurs once in 2 sec.
Increases ATK Spd by 240, and attacks on Locked On enemies, dealing 240% of ATK as extra M.DMG. Extra damage effect occurs once in 2 sec.

weapon.introduction: A magic gear created by Sonia, the Archmage of Blue. It is enchanted with magic that allows it to reach incredible speeds. It is also enchanted with a special spell that always guides it back to its owner after it's thrown. It is the best gift Sonia could give to Mirianne, who is both a family and friend to her. In other words, it's a weapon expression of love reserved only for Mirianne.

treasure.name: Magic Powder of Lightning
description: [Assassination] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit increases own ATK by 10% for 10 sec.
[Assassination] DMG is increased by 50% and upon Crit Hit increases own ATK by 12% for 10 sec.

treasure.introduction: A collection of beautiful matter that is sprayed in Sonia's crystal ball like stars. Mirianne collected it to pull a prank, but it;s so powerful that it;s being used as a tool for assassination.

treasure-2.name: Gemini Ring of Instant Teleportation
description: [Restrain and Protect] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and upon Crit hit recovers 120 Mana.

treasure-2.introduction:
Ring that Mirianne purchased at the 'Amazing Magic Toy Shop' in Orvel. She engraved Sonia's and her name in the ring. The two make a set, and it allows each other to teleport to the location of the other once a day. Though, Sonia doesn't use it since it's troublesome...
It may be a toy, but Mirianne is happy that there's one more way for her to protect Sonia.

weapon.name: Ultimate Weapon, Leviathan
description: Deals P.DMG equal to 100% of ATK to the enemies inflicted by the Boooooom! skill at a 50% chance, and the target takes 20% more P.DMG for 5 seconds.
Deals P.DMG equal to 120% of ATK to the enemies inflicted by the Boooooom! skill at a 50% chance, and the target takes 24% more P.DMG for 5 seconds.

Deals P.DMG equal to 250% of ATK to the enemies inflicted by the Boooooom! skill at a 50% chance, and the target takes 50% more P.DMG for 5 seconds.
weapon.introduction: Back when Miruru reigned as the pirate empress, she was feared by sailors and a major threat to the naval forces of Orvelia and the empire. The cannons on her ship were especially terrifying to the Navy. The most powerful of them was the Leviathan, the ship's main cannon. After being cursed, she took one thing with her as she fled from her mutinous crew. Its value as a weapon is in fact more valuable than any gold or loot. She took with her the Leviathan, the most powerful cannon in her arsenal. After numerous modifications, the once-terror of the sea now serves as a mobile artillery.

treasure.name: Miruru Cannonball
description: [Miruru Pirates!] DMG is increased by 50%, and skill cooldown is reduced by 12%.
[Miruru Pirates!] DMG is increased by 50%, and skill cooldown is reduced by 14%.

treasure.introduction: Cannoball engraved with the symbol of the Miruru Pirates. Miruru still vividly remembers her glorious past. Her fluttering flag emblazoned with a shark, and the sounds of explosions that were at her command. Those fond memories of enemy ships sinking in terror still remain within her. Miruru is using special cannonballs to attack enemies, while waiting for the glorious days to come back once again.

treasure-2.name: Pirate King's Sextant
description: [Roll Over] increases DMG by 4% on every use and recovers 120 MP upon a Crit Hit. This effect stacks up to max 10 times.
[Roll Over] increases DMG by 4.8% on every use and recovers 120 MP upon a Crit Hit. This effect stacks up to max 10 times.

[Roll Over] increases DMG by 10% on every use and recovers 120 MP upon a Crit Hit. This effect stacks up to max 10 times.
treasure-2.introduction:
Sextant of Pirate King Olga, who was the first to discover the new continent.
Pirate King Olga went past the Orbis Continent to find a new continent, following a revelation from the gods. The sextant can calculate the most accurate location and angle in the world. Miruru uses the sextant to boost the damage from rolling bomb attacks, but she doesn't remember how she ended up with it.

weapon.name: Roar of Madness, Velkinoth
description: Each auto attack increases Penetration and ATK Spd by 8. Can be stacked up to 30 times max.
Each auto attack increases Penetration and ATK Spd by 10. Can be stacked up to 30 times max.

weapon.introduction: A pair of magical weapons that absorb the bloodlust of their user to enhance their own firepower. Each pull of their trigger pushes the user deeper and deeper into the craze of the battle. It is said that when a master craftsman creates a weapon, it develops a soul. Berkinos seem to have the soul of the war god. According to the story, when their creator pulled their triggers for the first time, he suddenly turned pale with terror and threw them into a river.

treasure.name: Wolfhead Mercenary Insignia
description: [Dance with me!!] DMG is increased by 20% and per every activation, skill cooldown is reduced by 5%. This effect can be stacked max 8 times.
[Dance with me!!] DMG is increased by 24% and per every activation, skill cooldown is reduced by 5%. This effect can be stacked max 8 times.

treasure.introduction: Rune of the greatest mercenaries. the Steel Wolves. A rune that symbolizes the mercenary Steel Wolves, who were called the demons of the battlefield. Mitra was called the Silver Wolf of the battlefield. Even after he's left the mercenaries, he carries it in remembrance of the battle against the naval officer of the empire.

treasure-2.name: Wolf's Barrage Box
description: [Time to Die!] Increases Crit DMG by 20% for the skill's duration. HP cannot be reduced below 10% for 3 sec.
[Time to Die!] Increases Crit DMG by 24% for the skill's duration. HP cannot be reduced below 10% for 3 sec.

treasure-2.introduction:
Steel Wolf's special barrage box.
The Steel Wolves were infamous for being too violent and making it impossible to revitalize their enemies.
The most infamous Silver Wolf only uses the maximized Wolf Barrage Box that he got from the owner of the Gold Bar.

weapon.name: Flame of Victory, Carprain
description: Every 10 sec, deals 80% of ATK as M.DMG to enemies inflicted with Flame and has a 14% chance of knocking them down. Per every stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%.

weapon.introduction: In the heart of the Dragia Volcano, there exists a smithy. Hundreds of years ago, Temeraire, the ancient fire dragon, created a set of magically enchanted gear. Using lava infused with the power of the volcanic fire, he forged a shield and a sword capable of incinerating anything. During the war against the Demons, Temeraire presented these to a human warrior. Unfortunately, the warrior is said to have been defeated by Morrah. No one has seen this legendary gear since then. That is, until Morrah reappeared on the front line.

treasure.name: Hellish Sealing Stone
description: [Lava Eruption] DMG is increased by 20% and target's M.DEF is decreased by 25% for 7 sec.
[Lava Eruption] DMG is increased by 24% and target's M.DEF is decreased by 25% for 7 sec.

treasure.introduction: A strange fragment that came from the Dimensional Rift. Inside the fragment, there's a flame that kills anything that is living. The energy from its dimension is condensed within it, it's absolutely needed to complete Maria's plan.

treasure-2.name: Hatchling Leather Gloves

[Hellfire] Upon blocking target's M.ATK during the skill's duration, DMG reduction is increased by 120 and M.Crit resistance is increased by 250.

treasure-2.introduction:
Gloves made with a dark Hatchling's bones and skin.
Morrah made it a hundred years ago by collecting the Hatchlings she killed when she went out to hunt dragons.
It's very durable to even withstand Morrah's flames, and even imbues a stronger power to let those flames blaze up even more.
Morrah really likes these gloves.

weapon.name: Cursed Claws, Baroro
description: Upon a Crit Hit, deals 100% of ATK as P.DMG over time for 10sec. Target takes 20% increased P.DMG for the duration of skill.
Upon a Crit Hit, deals 120% of ATK as P.DMG over time for 10sec. Target takes 24% increased P.DMG for the duration of skill.

Upon a Crit Hit, deals 250% of ATK as P.DMG over time for 10sec. Target takes 50% increased P.DMG for the duration of skill.
weapon.introduction: A cursed pair of gauntlets crafted from the claws of the Mad Demon Baroro, which was defeated during the war. Several times the size of average human hands, these gauntlets directly connect to the nerves of the wearer, allowing its wielder to control them effortlessly. Although they grant immense power, they also break the mind of the wearer, slowly eating away at the soul. Only a true warrior of noble conviction, strong will and undying spirit may handle these cursed weapons. They are the perfect weapons for a warrior with a strong will that shines even in the darkness of the abyss.

treasure.name: Tempest Pride
description: [Dive Bomb] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and target takes 10% more P.DMG for 10 sec.
[Dive Bomb] Skill cooldown is reduced by 30% and target takes 12% more P.DMG for 10 sec.

treasure.introduction: A ritual offering of ancient religious people who worshiped the wind. It is a precious treasure among the Harpies, and it said to be given to the most powerful Harpy warrior. The moment one wears this mask, they'll be able to freely use the wind. They can also attack at the speed of light.

treasure-2.name: Himmullis's Scarf
description: [Wind Reading] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and M.Dodge by 100.
[Wind Reading] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and M.Dodge by 120.

treasure-2.introduction:
The scarf that the dead Himmullis had on. Naila always has it on her.
Himmullis use to always tell Naila to be proud of being a Harpy.
The scarf contains the sadness of losing family, and this makes Naila furious.

weapon.name: Dimensional Key, Magnus Fille
description: Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 30%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 4%.

weapon.introduction: There exists a universal string that connects different dimensions. This sword is the key that can sever and reconnect this sting. It is bestowed upon the dimensional arbitrator sworn to protect the balance of the universe. It can be duplicated indefinitely, but will only grant its powers to the chosen one.

treasure.name: Dimension Stone
description: [Infinity Blades] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 20%.

treasure.introduction: A required item for wizards to go through dimensions. The Diamond stone is a magic stone that is loved by those who go through dimensions, and it contains unlimited energy. However, the power that one can use from it depends on the individual's ability. Only high ranking wizards can use it effectively.

treasure-2.name: Sword of Flow Cutting
description: [Dimension Cleaver] DMG is increased by 50% and own Crit DMG is increased by 10% for 8 sec per each hit enemies. This effect can be stacked max 5 times.
[Dimension Cleaver] DMG is increased by 50% and own Crit DMG is increased by 12% for 8 sec per each hit enemies. This effect can be stacked max 5 times.

treasure-2.introduction:
A legendary sword that has transcended eras.
A legendary sword that was made with the light of the sun and the melted souls of those in pain.
It is one of the required items for Dimension Cleaver since it is durable enough to withstand dimension and can be made very sharp.

weapon.name: Moonshade Countdown, Tempodiana
description: Upon using Time Distortion, All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by extra 2 sec, and ATK is increased by 14% for 10 sec.
Upon using Time Distortion, All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by extra 3 sec, and ATK is increased by 17% for 10 sec.

Upon using Time Distortion, All allies' skill cooldown is reduced by extra 7 sec, and ATK is increased by 35% for 10 sec.
weapon.introduction: After Oddy's watch was zapped with the Redpur curse and gained the power to control time over a living being, he used the infinite time he gained to research its possible applications. When he finally created a watch containing the essence of time magic after so many trails, Oddy found out that the secret of Redpur magics originated from moonlight and the shadow it creates. H named his masterpiece 'Tempodiana' and gave it the nickname 'Moonshade Countdown'.

treasure.name: Threads of Time
description: [Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 20% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.
[Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 24% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.
[Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 29% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.

treasure.introduction: Fur of the Red Fur Chief hung in the shadow of the moon. It is said that the mythical creature, the Red Fur Chief, uses the shadow of the moon during full moon to go through dimensions and dance. The Red Fur Chief dances until the shadow of the moon disappears, and it said that his tail sometimes gets stuck in the pathway. The fur of the colorful mythical creature gets stuck in the rift of time and space and stops time temporarily. Oddy uses the fur from the traces of the shadows of the moon to make a skein and uses it effectively for Time Distortion.

treasure-2.name: Fragment Collection
description: [Time Fragments] Has a 25% chance to reset Cooldown and increases DMG by 20%.
[Time Fragments] Has a 25% chance to reset Cooldown and increases DMG by 24%.

treasure-2.introduction:
Time Fragments that fell from the shadows of the moon.
Sometimes, Time Fragments fall from another dimension from the effect of the shadow of the moon that appears when using time magic.
The Time Fragments are small, but when gatherd, they become a giant Fragment Collection of records, which give ceaseless inspiration to the caster.

weapon.name: Dragon Hearts, Andarta Andraste
description: Every 15 sec, deals 160% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
Every 14 sec, deals 192% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
Every 12.5 sec, deals 228% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.

Every 9.5 sec, deals 332% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
Every 8 sec, deals 400% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
weapon.introduction: Andarta and Andraste were two dragons who were defeated by the demons during the war. They were a pair connected at the soul. They were lovers who understood each other better than anyone. Even as they lay dying, they refused to stay apart, and made one final request to Pavel, their comrade. Pavel granted their final wish by transferring their souls into their hearts, and then turning them into a pair of gems. Even though the two have lost their bodies, they remain together, and as inseparable as ever.

treasure.name: Glacial Heart
description: [Icy Conquest] DMG is increased by 50% and Freeze duration is increased by 1 sec.
[Icy Conquest] DMG is increased by 50% and Freeze duration is increased by 1.2 sec.

treasure.introduction: Frozen blood of the winter spirit. Pavel found it deep inside the ice cave and made it into earrings. A harsh chill and severe pain can be felt from it, but it increases Pavel's mana to its limit.

treasure-2.name: Frozen Brooch
description: [Ice Spear] Reduces Cooldown by 8% and has a 40% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 sec upon damaging the enemy in Frost state. This effect is not applied to additionally created spears.
[Ice Spear] Reduces Cooldown by 8% and has a 48% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 sec upon damaging the enemy in Frost state. This effect is not applied to additionally created spears.

[Ice Spear] Reduces Cooldown by 8% and has a 100% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 sec upon damaging the enemy in Frost state. This effect is not applied to additionally created spears.
treasure-2.introduction:
The dragon of ice gifted this brooch to a young Pavel, and imbued it with its breath.
But after the dragon of ice and Pavel became one, it reminds Pavel to not leave him. It can inflict pain that pierces the heart.
Imbues a chill to Pavel's mana, making his magic even sharper.

weapon.name: Dragon's Ruins, Atein
description: Upon receiving DMG, stacks Dragon Rage for 10 sec. Per each stacked Dragon Rage, ATK and DEF are increased by 0.8%. Can be stacked up to 100 times max.

weapon.introduction: The Dark Dragons are Demons created to slay the dragons, the arbitrator of this world. During the war 100 years ago, these Dark Dragons killed and devoured countless of dragons. A few of the surviving dragons have gone insane from the rage and shame, and they eventually turned into Mad Dragons. They are now nothing more than giant monsters powered by their destructive instincts. Phillop and his Dwarves have been hunting these Dark Dragons since the Demon War, gathering their remains to forge legendary items.

treasure.introduction: A hammer that the ancient Dwarven King received as a gift from the Earth Elemental. It was a gift that the King received for saving the Gnome Kingdom from the attacks of the evil Earth Dragon Azi Dahaka. Upon using Earth Incarnate, this ceremonial hammer, imbued with the blessing of the spirit of the earth, increases DEF with the power of the earth's spirit, and grants immunity to HP recovery and CC.

treasure-2.introduction:
Ancient Dwarf King's capricorn helmet.
It is made from the gold of dragons that was obtained after defeating the greedy dark dragon Bokrug. The magnificent golden horn of the helmet is imbued with the dark dragon's magic that will slow down an enemy who is hit with Headbutt.

weapon.name: Tumultuous Dance, Excilius
description: When attacking the enemy with 'Vital Strike' or 'Turbulent Dance', per every hit enemy, corresponding skill's cooldown is reduced by 1 sec and ATK Spd is increased by 50 for 5 sec. ATK Spd boost can be stacked up to 10 times max.

weapon.introduction: During her military career, Priscilla felled countless enemies with her halberd. Although the halberd fell into a state of disrepair following her retirement, it was later resurrected as Excilius. This upgrade was a part of of the order sent to Annette to create Mahitra for Aisha. This razor-sharp and incredibly durable new weapon even has the magical power to draw its enemies in. Those who have seen Priscilla slaughtering her Demon foes using this halberd claim that it was like watching an unstoppable storm.

treasure.name: Magical Stone of Gravity
description: [Turbulent Dance] DMG is increased by 20% and target is inflicted by Stun for 3 sec.
[Turbulent Dance] DMG is increased by 24% and target is inflicted by Stun for 3 sec.

treasure.introduction: The first magic tool made by a wizard of Purple. The first gift that Aisha gave. Aisha created this magic tool because she felt bad that Priscilla used up so much power when using Turbulent Dance. The Mana Stone of Gravity relieves the pressure from the body when using Turbulent Dance, and it increases its effect.

treasure-2.name: Fancy Tea Set

treasure-2.introduction:
Aisha's favorite ceramic tea cups that Priscilla has ready at all times.
Luxurious tea cups made from the best clay of the eastern continent across the sea. It's mostly used for tea time with Aisha, but it is also used when using Coordination with Priscilla.

weapon.name: Lightning Flash, Livatis
description: Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 80 and Crit DMG is increased by 20% for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.
Upon a Crit Hit, ATK Spd is increased by 90 and Crit DMG is increased by 24% for 15 sec. Can be stacked up to 5 times max.
