weapon.introduction: The Stein family boasts a long lineage that dates back to the early days of the empire. The honor of the family, however, stems from the skills of its warriors, not its noble bloodline. Aria Stein was a legendary master of the blade. Remembered as one of the most skilled warriors in the history of the empire, she laid the foundation of the Stein family honor. Reina is her descendant. Aria's sword, Livatis, currently belongs to Reina. Light as a feather yet strong enough to withstand any strike, this sword helped Reina earn the nickname 'Flash'.

treasure.name: Medal of Swiftness
description: [Shooting Star] DMG is increased by 20% and upon Crit Hit, mana is recovered by 200.

treasure.introduction: A honorable medal given to the fastest mercenary. It's said to be a keepsake from Herz, the fastest warrior in the world. Wearing this medal will make the bearer's body feel lighter, and they'll be able to predict the opponent's movements.

treasure-2.name: Master's Ring

treasure-2.introduction:
The ring that Reina received after defeating her master. It's too big, so she wears it on her thumb.
It looks simple and ungainly, but the spirit of fighting is hidden within the rune letters engraved in the ring.
Staring at the ring of her master makes her feel like she will be getting more work today.

weapon.name: God's Lamp, Kurulati
description: Every 20 sec, an ally with the lowest HP turns invisible for 5 sec. An invisible ally becomes immune to P.DMG, and HP will not drop below 1 %. MP Recovery per sec is increased to 120%.

weapon.introduction: It is the duty of a soul guide to lead the lost souls into the right path, to help them move on to the next life. This lamp, powered by a mysterious orb created a long time ago by a dragon from a distant land, is a treasure of the Tamians. The orb at its core allows nearby souls to materialize, making it possible for its wielder to talk to them directly. As such, it is the ultimate medium for a soul guide. Tamian chieftains have used this relic to carry out the sacred duties of a soul guide for generations. Now, in the face of a great danger that threatens the world, the lamp has been passed on to Rephy, the most powerful soul guide in existence.

treasure.name: Haven of Souls

treasure.introduction: An ornament that was used for the memorial ceremonies of deceased royalty in ancient times. Inside the green jewel, there's a crystallized tear of the mythical creature that leads people to death. It's used as a resting places to comfort the emptiness within souls.

treasure-2.introduction: A collection of the energy that is created when a life is born. It's very warm and gentle, so souls like it. Rephy uses it to start a fire in a lamp to borrow the power of the souls. When a seed is put in a lamp, it shines brightly, like when the sun was first born.

weapon.name: Light of Judgment, Theoria

weapon.introduction: When the Holy Sword Aea was bestowed upon Kyle, it appeared in the Temple of Lua located north of the King's Plains. When Kyle removed the sword from the altar, it released a powerful wave of light that turned the entire vicinity into a sacred ground. Everything contained within the Temple was turned into holy relics. Theoria, the central pillar of the Temple, absorbed the greatest amount of holy energy of them all.

treasure.name: Templar Vow

treasure.introduction:
The seal that Ricardo used for the pledge of the Holy Warrior. When first appointed as a Holy Warrior, knights leave their names on the certificate of oath with their seals. Ricardo made his seal with his affection for the Church of Lua.
He still carries it now, after all this time.

treasure-2.name: Pride of Holy Warrior

treasure-2.introduction:
Shield of the arbiter of Lua's Holy Knights.
Artifact given to those who've earned the title of Arbiter from the Lua's Holy Knights.
An artifact imbued with Goddess Lua's blessing, it protects those under the benevolence of the god, and punishes enemies without mercy.

weapon.name: Rodina Custom Rifle Mod.0

weapon.introduction: The essence of the most sophisticated imperial technology. Requiring superhuman precision, this rifle cannot be handled by a regular person. It has been magically enhanced to allow the shooter to see impossibly long distances. Even the greatest scope in the world, however, is useless in the hands of someone who can't aim with it. As such, the performance of this rifle has significantly depended on the skills of its users. Rodina, gifted with superb vision and precise control, is a suitable owner of this rifle. She went one step further and customized it to her preference, naming it Rodina Custom.

treasure.introduction: A barrage that was requested to the legendary blacksmith of the empire. It contains gunpowder made from the sturdy egg of a pitta and the jaw bone of a dragon turtle. It was made small so that Rodina can use it easily, but it has the power to destroy anything.

A sniper rifle support that Pavel made so that it would fit Rodina's small body.
It's made of crystals so it's very firm and sturdy. This support is enough to aim at any target.

weapon.introduction: The most legendary sword in Orvelia. This sacred blade has been passed down the royal lineage of Orvelia since the kingdom's birth, symbolizing the true authority of the monarch. King Kyle used this sword as well, until he was chosen by the Holy Sword Aea. Blessed with the power of light, its blade can disable any magic by cutting through its flow. Only a knight of noble bloodline and righteous pride can wield this sword. Those who wish to lift it must pass the trial of the royal family, a feat only accomplished by Scarlet, aside from Kyle.

treasure.name: Pride of Orvelia

treasure.introduction: A celebratory flag that was made to praise the king when Orvelia was first founded. Whenever she sees the flag in the office, it angers her to think of the treacherous subjects who reduced her father to a scarecrow and the flatterers who ruined the country. This made Scarlet even more determined to restore Orvelia's days of glory and to establish a stronger throne.

treasure-2.name: Wings of Justice

treasure-2.introduction:
Pendant made by Scarlet, whose principles won't let her ignore injustice or kneel in the face of cowardice. She gifted one each to the people she relies on: Clause and Demia.
The shining wings of the royal emerald, which symbolize justice, are embedded inside the pendant. One can straighten oneself out by staring at the pendant that reflects one's eyes. She looks at it each time she feels despair by looking at the people who lay blame on her father Veroglance II.

weapon.name: Green Winds, Notos

weapon.introduction: A bow blessed with the breath of Sylph, the Wind Elemental. Only a person of noble character may wield it. When drawn, the bow nocks itself with a deadly magic arrow created from the breath of the Elemental. Guided by the Wind Elemental, the arrow never misses its target, no matter where it's hiding. Selene has shared special bonds with Elementals since childhood. She was specially close to Sylph, who enchanted her bow a as a sign of their friendship.

It is said that the Goddess of Hunting and the Moon cared for the Elves who protected the holy forest, and she lent her power to them through the artifact. The silver arrow imbued with the power of the Goddess of the Moon has a mysterious power that allows the user to his enemy and boost DMG.

The violent Wind Bow Spirit is sealed within this stone.
Sealed stone containing the Wind Bow Spirit that was sealed by the Fairy King for causing all kinds of fights and pulling evil pranks.
The Wind Bow Spirit is thirsty for a fight and increases the killing rate of the bow of the archer that summoned him by 5 times or more.

weapon.name: Eye of the Storm, Yanadis

weapon.introduction: A sphere of electricity created by Sonia based on the beast core that is now her own heart. She has shown great talent in making magic gear, and this is the first weapon she ever created. it's a bit lacking in stability, mostly due to the overwhelming electricity it contains. The powerful electrical storm created by this weapon is truly dangerous for any enemy. In fact, anyone besides Sonia who touches it would be instantly fried by the immense current that flows through it.

treasure.introduction: Heart of Vikal, who is called a holy beast. He eats the enemies of light and dark from the world, so his heart is full of thunder from the collision between the two enemies. If someone unskilled were to touch it, he would be absorbed by its power. But Sonia, who is made up of the core of lighting, absorbed that power and obtained mana that is beyond imaginable.

treasure-2.introduction: A cloak that Mirianne made for Sonia by braving a danger. There was a time when Sonia's clothes would burn from the explosion of the electriciy that ran through her body. Mirianne saw that and plucked out the ereth plant that is said to grow by being struck by lightning. She pulled out its thread and completed a cloak with it. Sonia saw Mirianne's blistered hands from the electricity, and she cried in silence for a long time. A piece of clothing just for Sonia that can't be found anywhere else.

weapon.name: Demon of the Calm, Caethasis
description: Each auto attack has a 10% chance to deal 140% of ATK as extra P.DMG to target, and turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. Cooldown is 10 sec.
Each auto attack has a 12% chance to deal 170% of ATK as extra P.DMG to target, and turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. Cooldown is 10 sec.

Each auto attack has a 25% chance to deal 350% of ATK as extra P.DMG to target, and turns into Stealth mode for 10 sec. Cooldown is 10 sec.
weapon.introduction: The Demon War dates back to 100 years ago. During this war, the greatest threat to mankind was, without a doubt, the high-ranking Demon officers. Kaitasis, the Demon of the Calm, was especially dangerous among them. Countless wizards and priests were slaughtered by this Demon who specifically targeted magic users for their souls. Eventually, Kaitasis was defeated by Kyle, and its core came into the possession of the Laughing Mask and it once again served as an instrument of Death.

treasure.name: Dagger of Silence
description: [Whisper of Death] DMG is increased by 20% and upon use, immediately gains Stealth. If used in Stealth mode, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec.
[Whisper of Death] DMG is increased by 24% and upon use, immediately gains Stealth. If used in Stealth mode, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec.

[Whisper of Death] DMG is increased by 50% and upon use, immediately gains Stealth. If used in Stealth mode, ATK is increased by 20% for 10 sec.
treasure.introduction: A dagger given to those who complete the first mission of the Laughing Mask. There's a rule that says that assassins should always carry the dagger that has traces of their target. The silent dagger that assassins carry like an amulet consistently whispers to them about death.

treasure-2.name: Laughing Mask All-round Belt
description: [Blade Tornado] Increases DMG by 20% and reduces Cooldown by 8% upon a Crit Hit.
[Blade Tornado] Increases DMG by 24% and reduces Cooldown by 8% upon a Crit Hit.

treasure-2.introduction:
Multi-purpose tool of the Laughing Mask used for assassination.
Unique item of the Laughing Mask that gets rid of the target fast and accurately.
Even at the moment of Blade Tornado, it allows for an attack to be continued and is optimized for the wearer's attack patterns.

weapon.name: Lightning Bolt, Legios
description: Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 300, Crit DMG is increased by 100%, and Penetration is increased by 300. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 360, Crit DMG is increased by 120%, and Penetration is increased by 360. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 430, Crit DMG is increased by 144%, and Penetration is increased by 430. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 520, Crit DMG is increased by 173%, and Penetration is increased by 520. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 620, Crit DMG is increased by 208%, and Penetration is increased by 620. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.

Each auto attack and skill attack stacks 'Lightning' on self. Upon the 50th stack, 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' activates, and for 10 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 750, Crit DMG is increased by 250%, and Penetration is increased by 750. While 'Lightning Bolt, Legios' is activated, Lightning will not stack. This effect cannot be dispelled.
weapon.introduction: A spear said to to have been forged from a bolt of lightning. Electricity constantly flows around this impressive spear that stands as tall as an average adult male. Forging a spear from lightning was a tremendous task. But then again, Jin was no ordinary blacksmith. He smelted a huge mana stone infused with a red dragon's blood. He used this to contain the lightning before forging it into a spear. Aside from its chosen master, no person can touch this weapon. When its two pieces are combined, it lets out a tremendous flux of energy that resembles a dragon's roar.

treasure.name: Essence of Red Lightning

treasure.introduction: Legacy of the fallen Republic of Grey. A treasure that a respected palace wizard of the Republic of Grey gave to the 1st knight Theo, who received the Lightning Bolt Legios. The Lightning Bolt maximizes the effect of Lightning Explosion.

treasure-2.name: God of Lightning's Necklace

treasure-2.introduction:
Called a thunderbolt from the sky. Legios is also called a holy beast.
The power of Legios was so strong that when they made it into a weapon, the Republic of Gray couldn't contain all of its power.
So the greatest piece was put in the Spear of Lightning, and the remaining pieces were put into different places.
One of those pieces was put into God of Lightning's Necklace. It is said that anyone with this necklace can commune with the Spear of Lightning and get closer to the power of Legios.

weapon.name: Nightmare Fang, Kitrax
description: Enemies that had their Souls stolen take 25% increased M.DMG. Lasts for 10 sec.
Enemies that had their Souls stolen take 30% increased M.DMG. Lasts for 10 sec.

weapon.introduction: Nightmare Kitrax was known as the best, and the most terrifying, of the succubi. After devouring Kitrax whole, soul and all, Viska came up with her most powerful weapon yet. This spike is the physical manifestation of fear and despair. Death is the only fate of its unfortunate victims. It constantly injects fear into its victim's soul, reducing even the most formidable enemy to mere prey.

treasure.name: Soul of a Giant Demon
description: [I'll rip you to pieces!!] Gain immunity to CC during skill activation and upon every use, DMG is increased by 4%. This effect is stacked max 10 times.

treasure.introduction: Crystallized form of great demon Curapi's soul, who has the power to get big. He was one of the first demons that Viska hunted in the Demon world, and it is said that it used its big body to dominate his enemies. But battle isn't all about strength, but using one's brain as well. The giant demon was defeated and eaten by a predator who used her brain. The power to get big became Viska's , and she can use it freely now.

treasure-2.name: Rampaging Beast's Claw
description: [I'll Slice You Up!] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and adds 8% M.DEF reduction.

treasure-2.introduction:
Claw of the violent magic beast Urgol, who is said to bite off souls.
The day Viska decided to hunt in the Material World, she devoured Urgol from the Demon World.
Combined with the ability that Viska has to absorb the power of others, it displayed great power, and it is essential to eat Demons who trespassed to the Material World.

weapon.name: Dragonbane, Svelta
description: Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 10% chance of dealing 200% of ATK as P.DMG, and recovering 5% of Mana. If the target is a Dragon, inflicts Stun for 1.5 sec.
Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 12% chance of dealing 240% of ATK as P.DMG, and recovering 5% of Mana. If the target is a Dragon, inflicts Stun for 1.5 sec.

Upon a Crit Hit, there is a 25% chance of dealing 500% of ATK as P.DMG, and recovering 5% of Mana. If the target is a Dragon, inflicts Stun for 1.5 sec.
weapon.introduction: An enchanted weapon made from the bones, tendons, and pieces of hide the Mad Dragon Svelta. Too heavy for a normal human to even lift, let alone draw, this monstrous greatbow is a combination of the siege weapon technologies from the Dark Elves and Dwarves. Only those with incredible muscular strength such as Yanne can hope to handle this ridiculous bow. The Mad Dragon's soul still remains in this bow. Her ferocious energy rides on every arrow it fires, granting it the power to shatter through even the mightiest of walls.

treasure.introduction: T-bone steak from which you can taste a dragon's sirloin and tenderloin at the same time. The taste is truly wonderful. The dragon's holy energy enters the body, and increases Yanne's battle stamina to the max.

treasure-2.introduction: An arrow made from Mad Dragon Svelta's spine, who spews out powerful magic cannons. It's Yanne's loot. The arrowhead has the Mad Dragon's burning red eye. It's still imbued with its madness, always ready to burn the enemy.

weapon.name: Hellhound, Akistra
description: The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 50% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 30% and Crit DMG by 30% for 10 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 60% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 36% and Crit DMG by 36% for 10 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 70% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 43% and Crit DMG by 43% for 10 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 85% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 52% and Crit DMG by 52% for 10 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 100% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 62% and Crit DMG by 62% for 10 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 125% of ATK as P.DMG. When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 75% and Crit DMG by 75% for 10 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.
weapon.introduction: It is unarguably the culmination of the latest imperial technomagi technology. It can transform into three modes, the last of which uses magic that is so devastating that its use has to be restricted. According to Valance, the head of the imperial weapons development organization Magos Le'Flamme, the new weapon Archistra was stolen, immediately after its development, by Crow, a former naval officer who was dishonorably discharged. It remains to be confirmed whether Crow really did manage to infiltrate one of the Empire's most important organizations to steal Archistra...it's also possible that Valance simply handed it over to him, given their long friendship.

treasure.name: Pendant of Memories
description: [Even Gods shall Die] Gains immunity to CC during skill activation and DMG is increased by 20%.

treasure.introduction: A precious pendant containing the memories of Crow's deceased wife and daughter. He frequently stares at the picture while sucking on candy, looking extremely sad yet calm. It's a pendant even more precious than his life, so you better not lay a finger on it. Even if you are a god, you will have to pay with your life.

treasure-2.name: Cold Barrage
description: [Struggle is Meaningless] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and has a 10% chance to freeze target for 3 sec upon every strike.
[Struggle is Meaningless] Reduces Mana Cost by 1 and has a 12% chance to freeze target for 3 sec upon every strike.

treasure-2.introduction: Magos Le'Flamme, the imperial weapons development organization, succeeded in enhancing the Ground Chill Missile. They tried to equip it on the new weapon Akistra to test it out. However, Crow stole Akistra, so the missile that was equipped on it was stolen as well. This missile contains a powerful chill, and it's enough to freeze the surrounding land.

weapon.name: Jailer of Despair Barbatos
description: Fury duration is increased by 2 sec and when in Fury state, Crit DMG is increased by 80%.
Fury duration is increased by 3 sec and when in Fury state, Crit DMG is increased by 90%.

weapon.introduction: Ezekiel's father was one of the highest-ranking Demons. Although he does not know his father's name or face, he is aware of the tremendous power of the Demon blood he inherited. The Demon blood flowing within his veins also gave him a second personality. When his human blood prevails, Ezekiel is a young man of excellent character. At other times, he is an immensely powerful and arrogant Demon, just like his father, Barbatos, jailer of Despair, manifests itself when Ezekiel's Demon blood is in full power. Taking the form of one of his arms, this weapon is powerful enough to slash through dimensions and sever the space itself. It is the physical representation of his father's power.

treasure.name: Sealing Binds
description: [Strike of Doom] DMG is increased by 20% and gains 1 additional stack of Cursed Blood after using the skill.

treasure.introduction: A bond containing the mana of unknown priest. Young Ezekiel used to go berserk frequently. If anyone insulted his mom, he would allow his boiling demon blood to take over. Once he return to his sense, he would stare at this wounded arms and his terrified mom. When he was getting older, Ezekiel was getting rid of demons when he got into an argument with a bigger priest of Lua. He went berserk, just like any other day. Ezekiel was alone when he came to, and he was taken aback by the bond on his cursed arm. When he tried to take it off, he found the priest's magic couldn't be shaken off so easily. However, he stopped going berserk and losing his consciousness after that. He's gained greater control over his mana, so it's now one of his most treasured items.

treasure-2.name: Wild Beast's Choker

treasure-2.introduction:
Choker made with the skin of a powerful beast. Loot that celebrates the manticore that Ezekiel hunted after a hard battle against the Demons when he was young.
Ezekiel remembers the joy of killing the manticore every time he touches the violent beast's choker, just before he charges at the formidable enemy in front of him.

weapon.name: Cards of Destiny Del Arcana
description: Upon attack, there is a 77.7% chance that for 7 sec, ATK Spd is increased by 20, and mana recovery per sec is increased by 10%. This effect can be stacked max 15 times.

weapon.introduction: Tarot card reading is a common fortune telling method for witches. Some witches use customized cards to suit their personal styles. Ophelia's cards also function as the proof of the pacts between her and the creatures she summons. Quite popular as a guide of destiny among the entities of the mysterious dimensions, she has made pacts with countless creatures. Del Arcana, a powerful tarot deck carefully assembled by Ophelia, is the physical proof of these relationships.

treasure.name: Coin of Fortune
description: [Card of Fortune - Vellekia] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 20%.
[Card of Fortune - Vellekia] Mana cost is reduced by 1 and DMG is increased by 24%.

treasure.introduction: The legendary coin that it is said to have changed the curse of the wheel of fortune, which was headed towards destruction. Ophelia believes that it was thrown by the spirit of luck, Vellekia.

treasure-2.introduction:
Spirit of love, Elliciad's heart.
It eats both fulfilled and unfulfilled loves, so it can sometimes be as hot as lava, or as cold as ice. The power it displays depends on how contaminated a soul is, and it can display an extensive light of blessing to those with pure souls.

weapon.name: The Flute of Silent Winds Rakshathar
description: Max stack of Tickle Tickle Potion is increased to 55. Each auto attack has a 10% chance of attacking a random enemy, dealing 20% of ATK as DMG and inflicting Silence for 1 sec.

weapon.introduction: A hyper-accurate blowgun made by Requina herself. A special muting piece added at the end makes this already-quiet weapon almost completely silent. As the appearance of Demons began to hurt her business, she decided to utilize anything she could, not just poisons. She sought help from her elementalist friend, who imbued the blowgun with the wind's blessing. This gave the weapon firepower equal to that of a magic cannon. After adding Requina's ultra-deadly =, Demon-slaying poison to it, it became a powerful and deadly weapon capable of killing any living being.

treasure.name: Sparkling Potion

Schwanheite is counted among these awesome weapons. This harp, which insists that it be called 'Mr. Schute' can significantly amplify the wielder's mana and spray it all around the wielder. Since the amplified mana is scattered about, it cannot be effectively used as offensive magic. However, depending on how it's used it can prove to be extremely effective in other ways. Mr. Schute is quite a chatterbox, but only to those he considers as his friends. These days he only talks to Shea.

weapon.introduction: A weapon for Enhanced Human Type.0 that was made after thousands of attempts in one of the laboratories of the empire. Enhanced Human Type.0 destroyed everything as soon as he woke up from the laboratory in order to find a weapon that could withstand his power. In the end, he tore out the horn of the monster Cannibal, which was known to have swallowed Arrogance out of the 7 sins. This horn went through the hands of the greatest blacksmiths of the empire and became the Blood Lancer Monolith. The flame of sin is burning inside the weapon, and whatever it pierces cannot be healed. The feeling of striking with this weapon pleasurable enough to make him forget about the lingering attachment to his lost memory.

An item that Demia managed to get for Chase, since Scarlet was fond of him. Demia didn't show it much, but she was intrigued by how Chase normally seemed so naive, and yet was enthusiastic when it came to sparring. Demia watched him for a few days, and one day, patting his shoulder, she nonchalantly gave Chase the pauldron. She told him that fighting was important, but it was also important to take care of his own body.

treasure-2.introduction:
An item given to Chase by Scarlet. She gave it to him because she felt sorry for him for not having a name.
Chase's name is embroidered in one corner of the handkerchief.
It doesn't really match his look, but he carries it all the time.
Chase lost his memory and could only figure out who he was by the test subject code marked on his waist. The moment when someone called him by a name was when he finally found a goal in life.
He decided to use his overflowing power to protect those who made him feel alive.

It's a mighty weapon with the power of a siege weapon, and its power comes close to that of the highest-rank magic. This weapon was found in the ruins of the old Republic of Grey, but it remained in storage since no one knew how to use it. Long after that, Kara was excavated and once she awakened, it teleported to her side. The highest-ranking technomagic weapon that was made in a similar way as the Mountain Fortres

A recording device and processor that works as Kara's brain.
It's treasure that is filled with ancient wisdom, and its capacity far surpasses that of humans. Despite being such an incredible device, it has a hard time recording and replicating emotions.

The wings that grew powerful during the Demon War by absorbing the curses of countless people are terrifying to normal people. Those who are touched by the feathers are said to be bound by many curses, and they fall into a vortex of emotions. In that abyss, a captivating and seductive laughter echoes. The laughter of a demon that enjoys the different kinds of human feelings.

A strange jewel from which the resentful whispers of ancient demons can be heard.
A cursed item filled with the souls of long forgotten ancient demons.
They wish to escape every day, but she won't let them out that easily.
Her soul has accepted all the curses of the world, so it is as deep and dark as the abyss.

weapon.introduction: Her approval is needed to process any important items in the Guild Alliance. An office item cherished by the founder of the Guild Alliance. A feather pen and folder put together in a set. The pen has a mana ball embedded in it so it requires mana instead of ink, and it must be used on a magic parchment that cannot be written on with a regular pen. The letters that are written by the writer cannot be erased without the writer's mana. Also, text can be written on the magic parchment without any limit, and it has a function to search for stuff one has written before. It makes Veronica's work that much more effective. Of course, it's useful when it's used for work, but outside of work...

weapon.introduction:
The halberd held by an ancient guardian statue defending the gate of the labyrinth that was recently discovered at the Royal Underground. The old, eroded statue was holding the halberd firmly in its hands, as if showing its determination to protect the labyrinth against intruders. Loman, who was in charge of the labyrinth excavation, felt something indescribably sublime from the statue and showed due courtesy in front of it. At that moment, the statue dropped its halberd to the ground and began to crumble away. The halberd itself seemed unaffected by the time and was imbued with a mysterious energy.
'That statue suddenly crumbled and dropped the halberd...'
Scarlet said, glancing over the report.
'Yes, ma'am.'
Scarlet then gazed at Loman.
'The unyielding sincerity of protecting a place until his very body collapse... I know a man like that.'
'Pardon, ma'am?'
He looked at Scarlet with a puzzled face as she handed over the halberd, smiling.

treasure.introduction: An heirloom of Loman's family, this special pendant is bestowed by the first King of Orvelia to Loman's family in honor of their service and loyalty to protect the Orvel Monarchy. Its true origin is unknown, but it is believed to be an accessory that has the spirit of the Guardian of Orbis Continent from an ancient civilization. The owners of this item have said the same thing. When they resolve to stake their lives to defend what is important to them, they invoke a mighty power like the waves of the sea. People now believe this blue gem invokes spirits, and it started to be called the Sea of Invocation. Loman received it as an heirloom from his father when he entered the castle, and he always keeps it with him.

treasure-2.introduction: Loman used to carve small sculptures as big as his hand while his thoughts in order when things went wrong. As he smoothed out their edges, he'd feel at peace and recall his resolve when he was just learning the basics. It was just a pastime at first, but soon it became his hobby, and he filled his room with hundreds of sculptures. And one day, Loman started to make wooden dolls to give to his friends and his men. Back then, sorcerous dolls known to protect hearts from evil were popular in Orvelia. Loman asked an old shaman who practiced ancient folk remedies to enchant the wooden dolls with a spell of protection, and he gave them to his colleagues.
